myopenmath.statement:
Two aircraft are flying at 70 nm/hr. The Cessna Skyhawk has a stall speed of \displaystyle{v}_{{s}}={44} nm/hr, and the Cessna Skylane has a stall speed of \displaystyle{v}_{{s}}={54} nm/hr.
The Cessna Skyhawk has a maximum load factor that is G's
lower
higher
than that of Cessna Skylane.
Round to 1 decimal places.
